00029         typedef struct _OMax_SLT 
00030         {
00031                 t_object        ob;                     
00032                 t_symbol*       oname;

00071         int C74_EXPORT main(void)
00072         {       
00073                 t_class *c;
00074                 
00075                 c = class_new("OMax.SLT", (method)OMax_SLT_new, (method)OMax_SLT_free, (long)sizeof(t_OMax_SLT), 
00076                                           0L /* leave NULL!! */, A_GIMME, 0);
00077                 // assistance
00078                 class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_SLT_assist,"assist",A_CANT, 0); 
00079                 class_addmethod(c, (method)stdinletinfo, "inletinfo", A_CANT, 0);
00080                 
00081                 // input methods
00082                 class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_SLT, "int", 0);
00083                 class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_path, "path", A_LONG, 0);
00084                 class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_fullpath, "fullpath", A_LONG, 0);
00085                 class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_sortedSLT, "sorted", A_LONG, 0);
00086                 //class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_sortedSLTbis, "sorted", A_LONG, A_LONG, 0);
00087                 class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_ctxt, "in1", A_LONG, 0);
00088                 class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_setname, "set", A_DEFSYM, 0);
00089                 
00090                 class_register(CLASS_BOX, c); /* CLASS_NOBOX */
00091                 OMax_SLT_class = c;
00092                 
00093                 return 0;
00094         }

00098         
00101         void *OMax_SLT_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00102         {
00103                 t_OMax_SLT *x = NULL;
00104                 
00105                 if (x = (t_OMax_SLT *)object_alloc(OMax_SLT_class))
00106                 {
00107                         // inlets
00108                         intin(x, 1); // right inlet
00109                         
00110                         // outlets
00111                         x->out_path = listout(x); // rightmost
00112                         x->out_SLT = listout(x);
00113                         x->out_root = intout(x);
00114                         
00116                         x->obound = FALSE;
00117                         if (argc == 0)
00118                                 object_error((t_object *)x,"Missing name of the Oracle to read");
00119                         else
00120                         {
00121                                 if (argv->a_type != A_SYM)
00122                                         object_error((t_object *)x,"First argument must be a symbol (name of an existing Oracle)");
00123                                 else
00124                                 {
00125                                         x->oname = atom_getsym(argv);
00126                                         
00128                                         if ((argv+1)->a_type == A_LONG)
00129                                                 x->context = atom_getlong(argv+1);
00130                                         else
00131                                                 x->context = 1;
00132                                 }
00133                         }
00134                         
00135                         // color
00136                         t_object *box;
00137                         t_jrgba colorvals;
00138                         jrgba_set(&colorvals, 0.30, 1.0, 0.15, 1.0);
00139                         object_obex_lookup((t_object *)x, gensym("#B"), &box);
00140                         jbox_set_color(box, &colorvals);                        
00141                 }
00142                 return (x);
00143         }
00144         
00147         void OMax_SLT_free(t_OMax_SLT *x)
00148         {
00149                 ;
00150         }
00151         
00154         void OMax_SLT_assist(t_OMax_SLT *x, void *b, long io, long index, char *s)
00155         {
00156                 switch (io)
00157                 {
00158             case 1: // inlets
00159                                 switch (index)
00160                         {
00161                                 case 0: // leftmost
00162                                         sprintf(s, "int: get path & SLT of this state\n path int: get suffix path\n fullpath int: get whole suffix path (to 0)");
00163                                         break;
00164                                 case 1:
00165                                         sprintf(s, "minimal context of path & SLT");
00166                         }
00167                 break;
00168             case 2: // outlets
00169                                 switch (index)
00170                         {
00171                                 case 0:
00172                                         sprintf(s, "root of the SLT");
00173                                         break;
00174                                 case 1:
00175                                         sprintf(s, "states & lrs in the SLT");
00176                                         break;
00177                                 case 2:
00178                                         sprintf(s, "path to the root");
00179                                         break;
00180                         }
00181                                 break;
00182                 }
00183         }

00189         
00192         bool OMax_SLT_bind(t_OMax_SLT *x)
00193         {
00195                 if (x->obound == FALSE)
00196                 {
00198                         if ((x->oname->s_thing) && (ob_sym(x->oname->s_thing) == gensym("OMax.oracle")))
00199                         {
00200                                 x->oracle = &(((t_OMax_oracle*)(x->oname->s_thing))->oracle);
00201                                 // If binding is ok, then don't do it next time.
00202                                 x->obound = TRUE;
00203                         }
00204                         else
00205                         {
00206                                 object_error((t_object *)x,"No oracle %s declared", x->oname->s_name);
00207                         }
00208                 }
00209                 return x->obound;
00210         }
00211

00220         void OMax_setname(t_OMax_SLT *x, t_symbol *s)
00221         {
00222                 x->oname = s;
00223                 x->obound = FALSE;
00224                 OMax_SLT_bind(x);
00225         }
00226         
00230         void OMax_SLT(t_OMax_SLT *x, long statnb)
00231         {
00232                 if (OMax_SLT_bind(x)&&(x->oname->s_thing))
00233                 {
00234                         ATOMIC_INCREMENT(&(((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->readcount));
00235                         if(!(((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->wflag))
00236                         {
00237                                 if ((statnb>=0) && (statnb<(long)(x->oracle->get_size())))
00238                                 {
00239                                         O_state * state = (*x->oracle)[statnb];
00240                                         
00242                                         char err;
00243                                         long i = 0;
00244                                         list<O_state*> path;
00245                                         list<O_state*>::iterator pathit;
00246                                         
00247                                         O_state * root = state->rec_upSLT(&path, x->context);
00248                                         
00249                                         t_atom_long pathvals[path.size()];
00250                                         t_atom * pathout = NULL;
00251                                         for (pathit = path.begin(); pathit!=path.end(); pathit++)
00252                                         {
00253                                                 pathvals[i]=(*pathit)->get_statenb();
00254                                                 i++;
00255                                         }
00256                                         atom_alloc_array((long)path.size(), &i, &pathout, &err);
00257                                         if(err)
00258                                         {
00259                                                 atom_setlong_array((long)path.size(),pathout, (long)path.size(),pathvals);
00261                                                 outlet_list(x->out_path, NULL, (short)path.size(), pathout);
00262                                         }
00263                                         sysmem_freeptr(pathout);
00264                                         
00265                                         
00267                                         list<pair<O_state*,int> > SLT;
00268                                         list<pair<O_state*,int> >::iterator it;
00269                                         
00270                                         root->rec_downSLT(&SLT, x->context);
00271 
00272                                         t_atom_long vals[2];
00273                                         t_atom * SLTout = NULL;
00274                                         atom_alloc_array(2, &i, &SLTout, &err);
00275                                         if(err && i==2)
00276                                         {
00277                                                 for (it = SLT.begin(); it!=SLT.end(); it++)
00278                                                 {
00279                                                         vals[0]=(*it).first->get_statenb();
00280                                                         vals[1]=(*it).second;
00281                                                         atom_setlong_array(2,SLTout,2,vals);
00282                                                         outlet_list(x->out_SLT, NULL, 2, SLTout); // output
00283                                                 }
00284                                         }
00285                                         
00287                                         outlet_int(x->out_root, root->get_statenb());
00288                                 }
00289                         }
00290                         ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&(((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->readcount));
00291                 }
00292         }
00293         
00297         void OMax_path(t_OMax_SLT *x, long statnb)
00298         {
00299                 if (OMax_SLT_bind(x)&&(x->oname->s_thing))
00300                 {
00301                         ATOMIC_INCREMENT(&(((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->readcount));
00302                         if(!(((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->wflag))
00303                         {
00304                                 if ((statnb>=0) && (statnb<(long)(x->oracle->get_size())))
00305                                 {
00306                                         O_state * state = (*x->oracle)[statnb];
00307                                         
00308                                         char err;
00309                                         long i = 0;
00310                                         list<O_state*> path;
00311                                         list<O_state*>::iterator pathit;
00312                                         
00314                                         O_state * root = state->rec_upSLT(&path, x->context);
00315

00317                                         t_atom * pathout = NULL;
00318                                         for (pathit = path.begin(); pathit!=path.end(); pathit++)
00319                                         {
00320                                                 pathvals[i]=(*pathit)->get_statenb();
00321                                                 i++;
00322                                         }

00324                                         if(err)
00325                                         {
00326                                                 atom_setlong_array((long)path.size(),pathout, (long)path.size(),pathvals);
00328                                                 outlet_list(x->out_path, NULL, (short)path.size(), pathout);
00329                                         }
00330                                         sysmem_freeptr(pathout);
00331                                         
00333                                         outlet_int(x->out_root, root->get_statenb());
00334                                 }
00335                         }
00336                         ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&(((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->readcount));
00337                 }

00343         void OMax_fullpath(t_OMax_SLT *x, long statnb)
00344         {
00345                 if (OMax_SLT_bind(x)&&(x->oname->s_thing))
00346                 {
00347                         ATOMIC_INCREMENT(&(((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->readcount));
00348                         if(!(((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->wflag))
00349                         {
00350                                 if ((statnb>=0) && (statnb<(long)(x->oracle->get_size())))
00351                                 {
00352                                         O_state * state = (*x->oracle)[statnb];
00353                                         
00354                                         char err;
00355                                         long i = 0;
00356                                         list<O_state*> path;
00357                                         list<O_state*>::iterator pathit;
00358                                         
00360                                         O_state * root = state->rec_upSLT(&path, 0);
00361                                         
00362                                         t_atom_long pathvals[path.size()];
00363                                         t_atom * pathout = NULL;
00364                                         for (pathit = path.begin(); pathit!=path.end(); pathit++)
00365                                         {
00366                                                 pathvals[i]=(*pathit)->get_statenb();
00367                                                 i++;
00368                                         }
00369                                         atom_alloc_array((long)path.size(), &i, &pathout, &err);
00370                                         if(err)
00371                                         {
00372                                                 atom_setlong_array((long)path.size(),pathout, (long)path.size(),pathvals);
00374                                                 outlet_list(x->out_path, NULL, (short)path.size(), pathout);
00375                                         }
00376                                         sysmem_freeptr(pathout);
00377                                         
00379                                         outlet_int(x->out_root, root->get_statenb());
00380                                 }
00381                         }
00382                         ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&(((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->readcount));
00383                 }

00389         void OMax_sortedSLT(t_OMax_SLT *x, long statnb)
00390         {
00391                 if (OMax_SLT_bind(x)&&(x->oname->s_thing))
00392                 {
00393                         ATOMIC_INCREMENT(&(((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->readcount));
00394                         if(!(((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->wflag))
00395                         {
00396                                 if ((statnb>=0) && (statnb<(long)(x->oracle->get_size())))
00397                                 {
00398                                         O_state * state = (*x->oracle)[statnb];
00399                                         
00400                                         char err;
00401                                         long i = 0;
00402                                         list<pair<O_state*,int> > SLT;
00403                                         list<pair<O_state*,int> >::iterator it;
00404                                         
00405                                         SLT = *state->sortedSLT(x->context);
00406                                         
00407                                         t_atom_long vals[2];
00408                                         t_atom * SLTout = NULL;
00409                                         atom_alloc_array(2, &i, &SLTout, &err);
00410                                         if(err && i==2)
00411                                         {
00412                                                 for (it = SLT.begin(); it!=SLT.end(); it++)
00413                                                 {
00414                                                         vals[0]=(*it).first->get_statenb();
00415                                                         vals[1]=(*it).second;
00416                                                         atom_setlong_array(2,SLTout,2,vals);
00417                                                         outlet_list(x->out_SLT, NULL, 2, SLTout); // output
00418                                                 }
00419                                         }
00420                                         
00421                                         list<O_state*> path;
00422                                         O_state * root = state->rec_upSLT(&path, x->context);
00424                                         outlet_int(x->out_root, root->get_statenb());
00425                                 }
00426                         }
00427                         ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&(((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->readcount));
00428                 }
00429         }

00434         void OMax_sortedSLTbis(t_OMax_SLT *x, long statnb, long nbsol)
00435         {
00436                 if (OMax_SLT_bind(x)&&(x->oname->s_thing))
00437                 {
00438                         ATOMIC_INCREMENT(&(((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->readcount));
00439                         if(!(((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->wflag))
00440                         {
00441                                 if ((statnb>=0) && (statnb<(long)(x->oracle->get_size())))
00442                                 {
00443                                         O_state * state = (*x->oracle)[statnb];
00444                                         
00445                                         char err;
00446                                         long i = 0;
00447                                         list<pair<O_state*,int> > SLT;
00448                                         list<pair<O_state*,int> >::iterator it;
00449                                         
00450                                         if (nbsol>0)
00451                                                 SLT = *state->sortedSLT(x->context, (int)nbsol);
00452                                         else
00453                                                 SLT = *state->sortedSLT(x->context);
00454                                         
00455                                         t_atom_long vals[2];
00456                                         t_atom * SLTout = NULL;
00457                                         atom_alloc_array(2, &i, &SLTout, &err);
00458                                         if(err && i==2)
00459                                         {
00460                                                 for (it = SLT.begin(); it!=SLT.end(); it++)
00461                                                 {
00462                                                         vals[0]=(*it).first->get_statenb();
00463                                                         vals[1]=(*it).second;
00464                                                         atom_setlong_array(2,SLTout,2,vals);
00465                                                         outlet_list(x->out_SLT, NULL, 2, SLTout); // output
00466                                                 }
00467                                         }
00468                                         
00469                                         list<O_state*> path;
00470                                         O_state * root = state->rec_upSLT(&path, x->context);
00472                                         outlet_int(x->out_root, root->get_statenb());
00473                                 }
00474                         }
00475                         ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&(((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->readcount));
00476                 }
00477         }
00478         
00482         void OMax_ctxt(t_OMax_SLT* x, long ctxtin)
00483         {
00484         if (ctxtin>=0)
00485             x->context = ctxtin;
00486         else
00487             object_error((t_object*)x, "Minimal context must be positive");
00488     }
